titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Robert Levinn Handbook MC.327
titlestmt.author: Stacey Flatt

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-12-14 08:47:05 -0500.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York University. School of Engineering and Science

physdesc.extent: in 1 folder in a shared manuscript box.

did.abstract: Robert Levinn attended New York University School of Engineering from 1949 to 1953 and received his Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering. This collection includes a 1949-1950 Palisades Handbook: A Guide to Campus Life for NYU's University Heights campus. A supply list for an E.D.11. class within the College of Engineering is also in this collection.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by Lindsay Anderberg, Archivist and User Services Librarian, NYU Libraries, March 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.086.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Robert Levinn attended New York University School of Engineering from 1949 to 1953 and received his Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Robert Levinn Handbook; MC 327; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes a 1949-1950 Palisades Handbook: A Guide to Campus Life for NYU's University Heights campus. A supply list for an E.D.11. class within the College of Engineering is also in this collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning, material was housed in an acid-free folder and shared box.

did.unittitle: Palisades Handbook and Class Supply List
